alert.note: Alert for Carver; Hennepin; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:58PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hennepin, south central Wright and northern Carver Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Watertown, or 15 miles south of Buffalo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Delano around 205 PM CDT. St. Bonifacius around 215 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Maple Plain, Mound, Minnetrista, Chaska, Chanhassen, Orono, Victoria, Wayzata, Excelsior and Eden Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
